Pipeline Stage: Count matrices generation with CellRanger multi
Deescription: Analyse cell multiplexed samples from 10x, performs alignment, filtering, barcode counting and UMI counting
Input Files:
config_..._.csv
CMO_..._I1_fastq.gz
CMO_..._I2_fastq.gz
CMO_..._R1_fastq.gz
CMO_..._R2_fastq.gz
GEX_..._I1_fastq.gz
GEX_..._I2_fastq.gz
GEX_..._R1_fastq.gz
GEX_..._R2_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._I1_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._I2_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._R1_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._R2_fastq.gz
Output Files:
Cellranger multi outputs including but not limited to:
…_matrix.h5 (hdf5 file)
…_.bam

Deescription: Looping over FASTQ files from Illumina sequencing and validate Cellecta barcodes.
Input Files:
Cellecta_..._I1_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._I2_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._R1_fastq.gz
Cellecta_..._R2_fastq.gz
Whitelist_14nt.txt
Whitelist_30nt.txt

Deescription: Perform error correction on barcodes using hashing.
Extract the cellranger corrected barcodes from the alignment bam files - map to the observed/sequenced 10x barcodes.

Pipeline Stage: Compile list of uniquly observed 10x barcodes
Deescription: Run over the cellbarcodes and compress them down to the unique observed 10x barcodes.

Pipeline Stage: Identify and drop empty droplets with EmptyDrops
Deescription: Takes in all the 10x experiment cell calls and normalises them together. EmptyDrops removes poor quality cells.
Compute summarises for each sample of CMOs and cellIDs

Pipeline Stage: Demultiplex samples and assign CMOs to pools
Deescription: Uses the joint distribution of counts over all CMOs to assign cells from pools to correct CMOs

Pipeline Stage: Sample Normalisation and generation of single SCE object
Deescription: Takes in RDS objects from each pool and normalises across samples to generation a single RDS object

Pipeline Stage: Associate Cellecta Barcodes with SCE object
Deescription: Identify cell quality in terms of cellecta barcodes, then collate metadata for both sample varibles and cellecta barcodes for each cell.
Final script conducting analysis as per manuscript (Roux, Hamer & Shea, 2024) to identify clonal dynamics.
